explains: v. 整修，翻新重装；修改，完善

sentences.en: Electronics giants like Best Buy and Samsung have provided e-waste take-back programs over the past few years, which aim to refurbish old electronic components and parts into new products.
sentences.cn: 在过去的几年中，电子产品巨头百思买和三星等提供了电子垃圾回收项目，旨在翻新旧电子零部件并将它们转变为新产品。

sentences.en: We also need to refurbish our old buildings.
sentences.cn: 我们还需要翻新旧的教学楼。

sentences.en: Most of that money will be used to refurbish a port that will be for India's use.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱的大部分将被用来整修一个为印度所用的港口。
